name: Card Hog (itch)
description:
Hop on a grid-based dungeon crawl jam-packed with weird creatures, powerful weapons, magical shenanigans and dozens of exciting card combinations! 

A desktop  (PC)  version with more game modes (even local multiplayer) is available on Steam demo. Video recording and streaming is allowed, encouraged and highly appreciated!

Coming to Steam Early Access in June, 2020 with a dozen playable hogs, multiple game modes (single player, versus, co-op) and tons of customization options!

Code:  @SnoutUp, art: @EmiliusDraws
Game design inspired by Look Your Loot and Dungeon Cards.
